{"id":643918121,"lang":"cpp","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1645192106,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"42 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/643918121/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"18.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isValidSudoku(vector<vector<char>>& board) {\n        int dir[9][2] = {{-1,-1},{-1,0},{-1,1},{0,-1},{0,0},{0,1},{1,-1},{1,0},{1,1}};\n        unordered_set<char> s;\n        for(int i : {1,4,7}){\n            for(int j : {1,4,7}){\n                s.clear();\n                for(int k=0;k<9;k++){\n                    if(board[i+dir[k][0]][j+dir[k][1]]=='.') continue;\n                    if(s.find(board[i+dir[k][0]][j+dir[k][1]])!=s.end()){\n                        return false;\n                    }\n                    s.insert(board[i+dir[k][0]][j+dir[k][1]]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<9;i++){\n            s.clear();\n            for(int j=0;j<9;j++){\n                if(board[i][j]=='.') continue;\n                if(s.find(board[i][j])!=s.end()){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                s.insert(board[i][j]);\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<9;i++){\n            s.clear();\n            for(int j=0;j<9;j++){\n                if(board[j][i]=='.') continue;\n                if(s.find(board[j][i])!=s.end()){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                s.insert(board[j][i]);\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku"}
